comments:
Install I20040210
Download org.eclipse.swt.tests
Change the project classpath to use the plugin/org.eclipse.swt.win32/ws/swt.jar
Open AllTests
Set the -Djava.library.path to the plugin/org.eclipse.swt.win32/os/win32 folder
Run the AllTests.

You get bunch of E.E No Class Deffound error org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell
and the following errors in the .log file.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Feb 11, 2004 15:51:46.200
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

!MESSAGE Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException: 
JVMLK002: current thread not owner)

Created an attachment (id=7807)
log with many errors logged during the run of the junit tests
We no longer have an NT box to fix this on.
